info.name: LMS API v1
info.description:
LMS (Learning Management System) API Collection.

Authentication: All protected routes require Bearer token via Laravel Sanctum.

Set `base_url` and `token` variables before use.

item.name: Student
item.description: Student endpoints - requires auth:sanctum with student role

request.description: Returns main dashboard data: subjects, sessions, stats, attendance, tickets count.
Returns enrolled subjects with progress per subject.
Returns detailed statistics: attendance rate, monthly chart, session counts, total minutes.
Returns upcoming Zoom sessions and currently live sessions.
Returns useful links (portal, library, support, schedule, etc.).
Returns paginated attendance records with statistics. Optional subject_id filter.

query.description: Filter by type: live_zoom, recorded, etc.

request.description: Returns all sessions from student's program with filters and attendance records.
Joins a Zoom session. Creates attendance record and returns Zoom SDK signature + meeting details.
Records student leaving a Zoom session. Calculates duration_minutes.
Returns sessions as calendar events with color coding by status.
Returns subject details with sessions, attendance, and progress. Requires enrollment.
Returns unit details with sessions and attendance.
Returns program details, terms, enrollments, and statistics. Shows 'pending' if awaiting approval, 'no_program' with available programs if not enrolled.
Enroll in a program. Sets status to 'pending' for admin approval. Fails if student already has a program.
Returns available, upcoming, and past quizzes for a subject. Requires enrollment.
Returns quiz details, previous attempts, and active attempt if any.
Starts a new quiz attempt. Returns attempt ID and questions. Returns existing attempt if one is in-progress.
Returns quiz questions for in-progress attempt. Includes remaining_seconds for timed quizzes. Auto-submits if time expired.
Submits quiz answers. Auto-grades objective questions. Keys in 'answers' are question IDs. Use 'option_id' for MCQ, 'text' for essay.
Returns quiz result: score, total marks, percentage, time spent. Correct answers shown only if quiz allows it.
Returns paginated tickets with reply count. Optional status and category filters.

Creates a new support ticket.

category: technical | academic | financial | other
priority: low | medium | high
Returns ticket details with all non-internal replies.
Adds a reply to the ticket. Reopens the ticket if it was resolved/closed.
Returns available (pending) and completed surveys.
Returns survey with its questions. Returns 422 if already completed.

Submit survey responses. Keys in 'responses' are question IDs. Rating questions: integer 1-5. Text questions: string. Comments required for low ratings (1-2) if question has requires_comment_on_low_rating.
Returns subjects where teacher can be rated (not yet rated) and previously submitted ratings.
Returns subject/teacher info and rating categories. Returns 422 if already rated.
Submit teacher rating (NELC 2.4.9). All ratings 1-5. Comment optional (max 1000 chars). Requires admin approval before display.
Returns all payments with summary, installments, transactions, and payment gateway availability.
Returns payment details with program, installments, and transactions.
Initiates Tamara installment payment. Returns checkout_url to redirect user to Tamara.
Initiates PayTabs payment (Credit Card / Apple Pay). Returns redirect_url to PayTabs checkout.

item.name: Teacher
item.description: Teacher endpoints - requires auth:sanctum with teacher role

item.name: Admin
item.description: Admin endpoints - requires auth:sanctum with admin/super_admin role
